name: Lilsnake
description:
Are you bored? If the answer is yes don't worry.

Remember the 80's by playing this simple and fun free game! 

What about becoming a snake? A snake is always hungry  and wants to eat everything that stands in its way.

This game challanges you! The bigger you grow, harder it is to keep playing

* This game is in alpha version, which means it will eventually receive updates

*  Want to know how to make simple games like this one? By making a simple doantion of any vallue you can get acess to the code.

* Codev - Indie games - 2020

Contact : luisphilipelp2005@gmail.com
